Name: OLI_MARITAL_CIVILUNION
Definition: A relationship status of an individual who is living with and sharing a common domestic life with a partner in a same sex union that is not a legal marriage or a domestic partnership.

Name: OLI_MARITAL_COMMONLAW
Definition: An informal marriage or marriage by habit and repute that is legally recognized in limited jurisdictions to be a legal marriage. It exists as a result of state/local laws governing the establishment of spousal rights by virtue of the amount of time a couple has been living together.

Name: OLI_MARITAL_DOMESTICPARTNER
Definition: A relationship status of an individual who is living with and sharing a common domestic life with a partner that is not a legal marriage or a civil union.

Name: OLI_MARITAL_ESTRANGED
Definition: When a married couple is not legally separated but is living apart.

Name: OLI_MARITAL_HEADOFHOUSEHOLD
Definition: Head of Household for tax withholding purposes

Name: OLI_MARITAL_MARRIEDSINGLEWTHHLD
Definition: Married, but withholding at a higher single rate
